mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lee, Robert E. (Robert Edward), 1807-1870
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Robert E. Lee gives General William Henry Fitzhugh Lee, also known as William "Rooney" Lee, permission for the impressment of African Americans for repairing railroad lines (Weldon Railroad) around Petersburg. This note is the draft of a telegram and is neither physically written nor signed by Lee himself.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Weldon Railroad (Petersburg, Va.)
